name: EmulatorOnline Dark
description:
Lightweight dark theme for the emulatoronline.com website, 
including basic Google Ads blocking for the non-in-game ads.
additional_info:
• Darkened backgrounds whilst honouring the existing design-style
• Basic suppressing of Google Ads for non-in-game ads
• Tweaked menus, breadcrumb, hover-effects, pagination
• Some more minor padding and margin tweaks to optimize content-size
